description:
This course offers basic understanding of economic concepts. I think the material provided in this course will be useful in understanding the core ideas of economic process. The course includes the following:

  • Meaning of economics
  • Evolution of economic ideas over the years
  • Various definitions of economics
  • Whether economics is science or an art
  • Methodology of economics
  • Scope of Economics
  • Types of Economic systems
  • Fundamental problems of an economy
  • Solutions of basic or fundamental problems of an economy

This course will help you to understand various concepts and economic process in a better way. I am sure you will enjoy yourself while doing basic economics course.
title: Basic Introduction to Economics
